articles.title: Artificial intelligence could end disease, lead to "radical abundance," Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis says
articles.summary: At Google DeepMind, researchers are chasing what's called artificial general intelligence: a silicon intellect as versatile as a human's, but with superhuman speed and knowledge.
